name: Galencia
description: The 2017 Commodore 64 Game of the Year now available on Steam!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Dual Core + Memory: 1 GB RAM MB RAM Graphics: 512MB + Storage: 100 MB available space Additional Notes: Please make sure all your device drivers are up to date!
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: A recent i5 is a great all rounder Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: A recent gaming card Storage: 100 MB available space Additional Notes: Galencia is not a demanding game, just a fun one!
